languages.text: "Я должна предупредить. У вас будет не очень много времени для этой высадки. Мы фиксируем усиление штормовой активности, погода становится хуже с каждой минутой. И речь не о дожде или граде — местные шторма могут изрешетить шаттл в полете".

traits.locale_text: "Я должна предупредить. У вас будет не очень много времени для этой высадки. Мы фиксируем усиление штормовой активности, погода становится хуже с каждой минутой. И речь не о дожде или граде — местные шторма могут изрешетить шаттл в полете".

languages.text: "I must warn you: you won't have much time for this expedition. We are registering an increase in storm activity, the weather conditions are deteriorating rapidly. This isn't about rain or hail — the local storms can perforate a shuttle mid-flight."
languages.original_text: "Я должна предупредить. У вас будет не очень много времени для этой высадки. Мы фиксируем усиление штормовой активности, погода становится хуже с каждой минутой. И речь не о дожде или граде — местные шторма могут изрешетить шаттл в полете".

traits.locale_text: "I must warn you: you won't have much time for this expedition. We are registering an increase in storm activity, the weather conditions are deteriorating rapidly. This isn't about rain or hail — the local storms can perforate a shuttle mid-flight."

"I must warn you: you won't have much time for this expedition. We are registering an increase in storm activity, the weather conditions are deteriorating rapidly. This isn't about rain or hail — the local storms can perforate a shuttle mid-flight."

"I must warn you: you won't have much time for this expedition. We are registering an increase in storm activity, the weather conditions are deteriorating rapidly. This isn't about rain or hail — the local storms can perforate a shuttle mid-flight."

"I must warn you: you won't have much time for this expedition. We are registering an increase in storm activity, the weather conditions are deteriorating rapidly. This isn't about rain or hail — the local storms can perforate a shuttle mid-flight."

"I must warn you: you won't have much time for this expedition. We are registering an increase in storm activity, the weather conditions are deteriorating rapidly. This isn't about rain or hail — the local storms can perforate a shuttle mid-flight."

languages.text: 「この点については言っておかなくてはなりません。この旅にはあまり時間がないのです。嵐の活動が活発化しており、天候もどんどん悪くなっている。これは晴れでも雨でも関係ない、という話ではありません。局地的な嵐が運行中のシャトルに穴を開けることもあります」
languages.original_text: "I must warn you: you won't have much time for this expedition. We are registering an increase in storm activity, the weather conditions are deteriorating rapidly. This isn't about rain or hail — the local storms can perforate a shuttle mid-flight."

traits.locale_text: 「この点については言っておかなくてはなりません。この旅にはあまり時間がないのです。嵐の活動が活発化しており、天候もどんどん悪くなっている。これは晴れでも雨でも関係ない、という話ではありません。局地的な嵐が運行中のシャトルに穴を開けることもあります」

languages.text: “我必须警告您，这场探索需要尽快进行。我们发现风暴正在愈演愈烈，天气情况也在迅速恶化。暴雨与冰雹都是小事，如果遭遇强风暴，穿梭机可能会被摧毁。”
languages.original_text: "I must warn you: you won't have much time for this expedition. We are registering an increase in storm activity, the weather conditions are deteriorating rapidly. This isn't about rain or hail — the local storms can perforate a shuttle mid-flight."

traits.locale_text: “我必须警告您，这场探索需要尽快进行。我们发现风暴正在愈演愈烈，天气情况也在迅速恶化。暴雨与冰雹都是小事，如果遭遇强风暴，穿梭机可能会被摧毁。”

languages.text: « J'aime autant vous prévenir, vous n'aurez pas beaucoup de temps pour mener à bien cette expédition. Nous enregistrons une augmentation de l'activité orageuse, et les conditions climatiques se détériorent rapidement. Je ne vous parle pas de pluie ni même de grêle, mais de tempêtes capables de pulvériser une navette en plein vol. »
languages.original_text: "I must warn you: you won't have much time for this expedition. We are registering an increase in storm activity, the weather conditions are deteriorating rapidly. This isn't about rain or hail — the local storms can perforate a shuttle mid-flight."

traits.locale_text: « J'aime autant vous prévenir, vous n'aurez pas beaucoup de temps pour mener à bien cette expédition. Nous enregistrons une augmentation de l'activité orageuse, et les conditions climatiques se détériorent rapidement. Je ne vous parle pas de pluie ni même de grêle, mais de tempêtes capables de pulvériser une navette en plein vol. »

languages.text: «Debo advertírselo: no tendremos mucho tiempo para esta expedición. Estamos registrando un aumento de la actividad atmosférica y el clima empeora a cada momento. Y no es simple lluvia o granizo: las tormentas locales pueden agujerear una lanzadera en pleno vuelo».
languages.original_text: "I must warn you: you won't have much time for this expedition. We are registering an increase in storm activity, the weather conditions are deteriorating rapidly. This isn't about rain or hail — the local storms can perforate a shuttle mid-flight."

traits.locale_text: «Debo advertírselo: no tendremos mucho tiempo para esta expedición. Estamos registrando un aumento de la actividad atmosférica y el clima empeora a cada momento. Y no es simple lluvia o granizo: las tormentas locales pueden agujerear una lanzadera en pleno vuelo».

languages.text: "Ich muss Euch warnen: Ihr werdet für diese Expedition nicht viel Zeit haben. Wir registrieren erhöhte Sturmaktivitäten, die Wetterbedingungen verschlechtern sich rapide. Und wir reden hier nicht von Regen oder Hagel – die hiesigen Stürme können ein Shuttle im Flug durchlöchern."
languages.original_text: "I must warn you: you won't have much time for this expedition. We are registering an increase in storm activity, the weather conditions are deteriorating rapidly. This isn't about rain or hail — the local storms can perforate a shuttle mid-flight."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss Euch warnen: Ihr werdet für diese Expedition nicht viel Zeit haben. Wir registrieren erhöhte Sturmaktivitäten, die Wetterbedingungen verschlechtern sich rapide. Und wir reden hier nicht von Regen oder Hagel – die hiesigen Stürme können ein Shuttle im Flug durchlöchern."

languages.text: "Seni uyarmalıyım: Keşif için çok zamanın olmayacak. Fırtına faaliyetlerinde bir artış olduğunu kayda geçiyoruz. Hava koşulları anbean kötüleşiyor. Söz konusu yağmur ya da dolu değil... Bu gezegenin fırtınaları, havadaki bir mekiği delik deşik edebilir."
languages.original_text: "I must warn you: you won't have much time for this expedition. We are registering an increase in storm activity, the weather conditions are deteriorating rapidly. This isn't about rain or hail — the local storms can perforate a shuttle mid-flight."

traits.locale_text: "Seni uyarmalıyım: Bu keşif için çok zamanın olmayacak. Fırtına faaliyetlerinde bir artış gözlemliyoruz. Hava koşulları anbean kötüleşiyor. Söz konusu yağmur ya da dolu değil... Bu gezegendeki yerel fırtınalar, havadaki bir mekiği delik deşik edebilir."
